articles.title: Marcos inaugural: Philippine Arena, MOA eyed as viewing sites - Philstar.com
articles.description: The Philippine National Police is eyeing the Philippine Arena, Mall of Asia and two other areas as viewing sites for the inauguration of president-elect Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on June 30, a PNP official said yesterday.
